text:
Hi everyone, quick question (both might not be related but any point in the right direction would be highly appreciated):
1) Can I do some integration work with OAuth on a developer account? I have been struggling to connect using OAuth for a while (through my app and also through the community login). I get directed to the authorization page but I get this error: <https://prnt.sc/p3u7wu>

2) For my app above, I am using this library: <https://www.npmjs.com/package/HubSpot>  – I haven’t gotten to the right and working version o the app. I just wanted to know if I wil experience CORS issues going forward. The app i built on VueJS (Nuxt). I’m new to both VueJS and HubSpot APIs. I don’t want to waste a lot of time on something that one of you might have done already and knows if it will work or not.
you can use oauth with a developer test portal , but not your developer account (the one you use to create apps)

I’m still unable to get the above to work. I tried from two test accounts. I also can’t seem to authorise the dev accounts on some of the HubSpot site, like: <https://community.HubSpot.com>

I get the same: “Couldn’t complete the connection” error.
